com.hazelcast.cache.impl

Class HazelcastServerCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
      • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.HazelcastServerCacheManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HazelcastCacheManager, Closeable, AutoCloseable, javax.cache.CacheManager

    public class HazelcastServerCacheManager
extends AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
    Hazelcast CacheManager for server implementation. This subclass of AbstractHazelcastCacheManager is managed by HazelcastServerCachingProvider.

    As it lives on a node JVM, it has reference to CacheService and NodeEngine where this manager make calls.

    When JCache server implementation is configured, an instance of this class will be returned when CachingProvider.getCacheManager() is called.

      • removeCacheConfigFromLocal

        protected void removeCacheConfigFromLocal(String cacheName)
        Description copied from class: AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
        Removes the local copy of the cache configuration if one exists. Default implementation does not require it. But client implementation overrides this to track a local copy of the config.
        Overrides:
        removeCacheConfigFromLocal in class AbstractHazelcastCacheManager
        Parameters:
        cacheName - cache name.
